item.title: UMG-Backed Chord Music Gets Investment From Searchlight Capital
item.description: The move comes months after Chord bought a stake in country superstar Morgan Wallen’s catalog from his record label Big Loud.

item.title: What’s Behind Universal Music Group’s U.S. Stock Listing Plan?
item.description: How soccer violence and the meaning of “intrinsic value” plays into the plan to list UMG in both Amsterdam and New York.

item.title: Universal Music Group Increasing Efforts on Music AI Patents
item.description: UMG said it’s filed for 15 patents through the partnership already, including one related to AI threat protection.
